thread.title: Man Utd news: Anthony Martial blames Jose Mourinho for poor form | Metro News
thread.title_full: Man Utd news: Anthony Martial blames Jose Mourinho for poor form | Metro News

author: Simon Rice For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Man Utd news: Anthony Martial blames Jose Mourinho for poor form | Metro News
text:
Simon Rice for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 8:05 am Anthony Martial’s form has been a concern (Getty) 
Anthony Martial has laid the blame for his poor second season at Manchester United on Jose Mourinho failing to pick him. 
The France international was quick to make an impact following his big-money switch from Monaco in 2015, ending his debut season as the club’s top scorer. Keep smiling! Mourinho of all people melts hearts with touching message to Ranieri 
However the 21-year-old has struggled to replicate that form this term, managing just three goals in the Premier League this season. 
Ahead of tonight’s Europa League game against St Etienne, the Manchester United striker was asked what the reason for his decline was. 
‘It is just because last year I played a lot, I had the possibility to play back-to-back games,’ Martial replied. ‘Now I enjoy playing and we have to wait.’ Martial's contrasting seasons
